quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: Tough times never last but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.text: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Tis better to have loved and lost than to have never loved at all.
quotes.author: Alrded Lord Tennyson
